title: "Painted Words/Tainted Logos" by John Langdon 2/4/10 @ TDC, NYC
content:
I just wanted to pass this along, John and I will be at the Type Director's Club this Thursday evening. Hey, everyone, I just wanted to let you know that I'll have several paintings hanging at
the Type Directors Club in New York in February and through March. The announcement is attached. The Type Directors Club is at:
347 West 36 Street Suite 603 New York, NY 10018
Contact info: 212-633-8943 e: director@tdc.org
http://www.tdc.org If you're in the NYC area on Thursday February 4, there'll be a reception
from 6-8 pm, and I'll be giving a brief talk about my work. I hope you get a chance to stop in sometime during those weeks, or maybe I'll see you at the reception! John | Attachment | Size | | --- | --- | | [JL POSTCARD front.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019093040/http:/typophile.com/files/JL%20POSTCARD%20front.pdf) | 658.13 KB |
author: dave bailey
